page.title: 11Welsh National Opera Project
page.content: The Opera D.I.Y. Project was set up by the Education Directo at the Welsh National Opera.The main sponsors are Allied Steel and Wire.Four community arts workers were brought in to the Welsh National Opera team; a writer,a designer,a composer,a dancer and combined with the Rubicon Dance Centre (a community dance organisation).The team were employed to develop skills and interest in the arts with schools and community groups in our Cardiff South area.First part culminated in a Carnival and Open Day where the different factions performend for each other.Over the Winter of 1985/86 a Community Opera will be written by the writer and composer based on the work done in the area during the Summer term 1985 and will be performed by the children and adults of the area somewhere in Splott in July 1986.
